INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_FUNTRF_CCYEX_REQ (AC_FUNTRF_CCYEX_REQ_ID, AC_FUNTRF_CCYEX_RID, AC_FUND_TXN_RID, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.acFuntrfCcyexReqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acFuntrfCcyexRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acFundTxnRid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
